data.text: @FlyWithIX @cgidubai @IndembAbuDhabi Why are confusing the customer, worst service  airline @FlyWithIX ,  customer support saying they need rtpcr report and you are posting something else , what should we do!
@FlyWithIX @cgidubai @IndembAbuDhabi @FlyWithIX India to Abu Dhabi on 10 th March.RTPCR required or not.I want to about passenger including infant.
@DanvirArora @FlyWithIX @cgidubai @IndembAbuDhabi Same with me they said itâ€™s required on call and posting something else no clear communication

@FlyWithIX @cgidubai @IndembAbuDhabi Hi Team ,
I had a conversation with your team/ customer care and they are saying it is required , please let us know if that is the case or not
@FlyWithIX @cgidubai @IndembAbuDhabi Can you confirm the list of documents required for travel from India to Sharjah (UAE)
@FlyWithIX @cgidubai @IndembAbuDhabi Hi, your customer service team is still insisting on a RT PCR test within 48hrs for travel from India to UAE! Why there is no clarity on this?
@FlyWithIX @cgidubai @IndembAbuDhabi Unvaccinated tourists are allowed entry in to the UAE, please clarify.. ? Or these rules are for those in the exempted category
@FlyWithIX @cgidubai @IndembAbuDhabi Customer care saying that untill is not posted on website it is not valid
@FlyWithIX @cgidubai @IndembAbuDhabi @FlyWithIX the customer care executive are still asking for covid report with QR code pls confirm
